title: Promises were made before about clearing blocks to big projects – what’s different this time?
description: The wide-ranging systemic reform contained in the Government’s 30-point plan is desperately needed but the slow political pay-off is a big issue that could stifle momentum
content:
Now for the hard part. 
The plan to accelerate infrastructure projects contains 30 actions which, if all are delivered, would indeed do much to speed the delivery of vital developments in areas such… [+4154 chars]
